tool_description: An API showing all the latest global news about the coronavirus pandemic
name: COVID-19 Pandemic Live News
title: COVID-19 Pandemic Live News

api_list.name: Get Individual COVID-19 News by Source
api_list.description: Get News about COVID-19 Pandemic from a specific news source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-pandemic-live-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-pandemic-live-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-pandemic-live-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-pandemic-live-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All COVID-19 Pandemic News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about COVID-19 Pandemic from all over the world
